channel.title: Dynamodb on sacredSatan/blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dynamodb on sacredSatan/blog

item.title: Sneaky Bugs: using defaults in schema with dynamodb-onetable
item.description: dynamodb-onetable is basically mongoose but for dynamodb. The schema def allows you to define fields with their types and an optional default value, with a behaviour that I didn’t expect, and caused a bug to sneak in.
